backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI/UX changes, affected files, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark modes and applying background/foreground utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling screen transitions, proposal state, and global effects like music and pointer glow.
frontend/src/components/audio/Background: Creates and controls looping romantic background audio with mute support.
frontend/src/components/audio/MuteToggle: Floating button to toggle mute state with icons and persistent storage.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Conf: Canvas animation that emits falling confetti particles from the center.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Hear: Canvas animation generating outward‑moving fading hearts in all directions.
CSS-based pulsing heart visual centered on screen.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Type: Typewriter effect component revealing text character-by-character with blinking cursor.
frontend/src/components/effects/PointerG: Canvas glow‑trail effect following pointer or touch movement with fading particles.
frontend/src/components/proposal/Playful: Renders yes/no buttons where the no button moves randomly to avoid clicks and triggers yes action on click.
frontend/src/components/romance/Floating: Canvas animation generating floating heart shapes that rise with wobble effects across the screen.
frontend/src/components/romance/GlassCar: A wrapper component applying a glass-style visual effect to its children.
frontend/src/components/romance/Sparkles: Canvas-based sparkle animation that spawns fading star-like sparkles across the screen.
frontend/src/constants/valentineCopy.ts: Stores static Valentine-themed UI text including button labels and celebration messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, authentication handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
Custom hook syncing state with localStorage and updating on key changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useProposalState.ts: Manages proposal acceptance state using localStorage-backed persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles defining fonts, Valentine-themed color variables, glass card styling, and Tailwind layers.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Defines keys used for storing app state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/screens/CelebrationScreen.t: Screen with animated romantic effects, typewriter message, virtual hug pulse, and replayable confetti/heart bursts.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Landing screen displaying proposal heading, subtitle, and playful Yes/No interaction within a glass card.
frontend/src/screens/ReturningTransition: Simple transition screen with floating hearts and pulsing/bouncing loading dots using VALENTINE_COPY text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling extended colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the romantic SPA, its features, architectural notes, and current state version.
